Class EclipseFormatterStrategy

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.funfried.netbeans.plugins.external.formatter.strategies.AbstractJavaFormatterStrategy

    public class EclipseFormatterStrategy
extends AbstractJavaFormatterStrategy
    Eclipse implementation of the AbstractJavaFormatterStrategy.

    markiewb, bahlef
